title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Quality system standards: origin and development terminologies, characteristics features, certification procedures, quality audit procedures and implementation, productivity and quality improvement through ISO 9000 Environment management system, scope of ISO 14000 and requirement, environment policies, planning, implementation and operation.
